participant_1.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

content.text: Hi! I'm new in Pittsburgh. What do you like to do here?
I like to take pictures. There's so much beauty to capture!
Oh yeah? What kinds of things do you like to photograph?
I like to take pictures of the city, especially the architecture. I also like to take pictures of nature.
Sounds cool! I'd love to see your photos sometime.
Sure! I'd be happy to show you.
Awesome! What else do you like to do here?
I also like to go to concerts.
Oh yeah? What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to rock and indie music.
Cool! I like rock music too. Do you have any favorite bands?
I like a lot of bands, but my favorite band is probably the Foo Fighters.
Oh yeah! They're awesome! I've seen them in concert a few times.
Me too! They're so good live.
It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm excited to get to know you better.
